title: BTC Turkiye
author: BTC Turkiye
content: David Sacks will be making a press conference today at 2.30pm EST and he'll be talking about Crypto for sure. This is a big one. But I cant find where to watch this live?Can someone help please?

comments.author: Zico.btc
comments.body: Ill be tuning in to X to watch it live. You can just search David Sachs; trending and it should pop up. BTC

comments.author: BTC Turkiye
comments.body: I can't believe there's still no link anywhere!!!Do people just not care about this? How about the crypto community?
